short_summary: Fabrication and supply of 1 runabout inboard jet boat, 6.25-6.50 meters in length, with step deck bow and trailer.
description: The procurement is for one 6.25-6.50 meter Runabout Inboard Jet Boat with step deck bow and trailer.
full_summary:
# Open Bidding Invitation for 6.25-6.50m Runabout Jet Boat

## Request For Proposal

### Contract Information

* Contract Title: [M8026-233998 - RCMP 6.25-6.50m Runabout Jet Boat](#contract-title)
* Contract Type: Goods and Services
* Contract Reference: WS3904908952
* Amendment Number: 7
* Solicitation Number: WS3904908952
* Publication Date: March 23, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 16, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: May 4, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 21, 2024

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Government Departments
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Yukon

### Contract Requirements

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking proposals for the fabrication and supply of a 6.25-6.50 metre Runabout Inboard Jet Boat with a step deck bow and Trailer. The proposed contractor shall provide a high-quality product that meets or exceeds the requirements specified in the contract documents.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Contracting Authority: [Tracy Birtwistle](mailto:tracy.birtwistle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

* Tender Description: The RCMP requires a 6.25-6.50 metre Runabout Inboard Jet Boat with a step deck bow and Trailer.
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15791467?extsite=MTU3OTE0NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

I made the following changes:

* Formatted the text in nice markdown format
* Renamed the contract title for readability
* Removed unnecessary information
* Standardized the format for contract information
